modmenu.descriptionTranslation.boathud: This mod adds a racing style HUD, configurable, for riding a boat, and is designed mostly for racing boats on ice.
boathud.config.title: BoatHud Options
boathud.tooltip.extended: Enables g meter and input trace display
boathud.tooltip.telemetry_directory: The path where telemetry files will be saved at
boathud.tooltip.checkpoint_file: The file where the checkpoint data is loaded from
boathud.tooltip.circular_track: Reset checkpoints after reaching the final checkpoint
boathud.tooltip.bar_type: Change the display and behavior of the speed bar:
boathud.tooltip.bar_type.packed: Water & Packed: Best for low speeds.
boathud.tooltip.bar_type.mixed: Mixed: Best for running on any kind of ice.
boathud.tooltip.bar_type.blue: Blue: Suitable mostly for blue ice racing.
boathud.tooltip.y_offset: Change y offset from the bottom of the screen
